title: Hochstetter (Dr. Ferd. von)
body: Austrian geologist who visited Madeira in July 1857, as a member of the scientific expedition led by Commodore Wuellerstorf-Urbair, commander of the frigate Novara. He measured the height of Pico Ruivo and wrote a booklet entitled Madeira (Vienna, 1861).

Madeira: Island visited by the geologist Dr. Ferd. von Hochstetter

1857: Year of the geologist Dr. Ferd. von Hochstetter's visit to Madeira
1861: Year of publication of the booklet entitled Madeira by the geologist Dr. Ferd. von Hochstetter
